results.content:
The course was straight to the point and covered the material well.

Adding a module that covers authentication, and protecting an API with JWTs etc, would really add value to this course!

I found that the audio was soft; I had to have to volume right up on a number of computers I used.

Laurence was extremely quick to respond to queries about source code, and was very helpful!

response.content: Thank you Terry for the feedback and review
